author: Special Correspondent
text:
BJP leader Subramanian Swamy on Sunday said work on constructing a Ram temple at Ayodhya would begin by the end of this year.

Addressing a function organised by the Hindu Munnani to release three DVDs claiming to document what it called “the rise of Islamic terrorism in Tamil Nadu”, he said the BJP was open to working with non-Hindu parties in future to expand the BJP’s reach in the State.

‘Stalin not anti-Hindu’

“DMK leader M K Stalin is someone we can work with in the future. Karunanidhi is anti-Hindu, but not Stalin. When a situation arises where Mr.Stalin heads the DMK, we will consider an alliance with the party,” Dr. Swamy said, adding this was his personal opinion.
title: Work on Ram temple to begin by year-end: Swamy
